TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Localize extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal

summary.span: 保留網頁上要顯示當地語系化靜態文字的位置。

span.span: Reserves a location on a Web page in which to display localized static text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項保留在網頁上要顯示當地語系化的文字的位置。Use the control to reserve a location on a Web page in which to display localized text. > [!NOTE] > 以外的控制項`body`項目都會被忽略。Controls that are outside the `body` element are ignored. 控制項是繼承自控制項，並等同於它在每種用途。The control inherits from the control and is identical to it in every way. 控制項在設計階段使用的靜態文字，您可以當地語系化區別其他靜態文字。The control is used at design time to distinguish static text that can be localized from other static text. 雖然控制項可讓您將樣式套用至顯示的文字，控制項則否。Although the control allows you to apply a style to the displayed text, the control does not. 您可以透過程式設計方式管理藉由設定控制項中顯示的文字屬性，繼承自控制項。You can programmatically manage the text displayed in the control by setting the property, inherited from the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to:防止 Web 應用程式中的指令碼攻擊，藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，並[ASP.NET Web Pages 中驗證使用者輸入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來顯示靜態文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to display static text. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Localize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Localize/CS/localizecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Localize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Localize/VB/localizevb.aspx#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class.

related.span: 常值的 Web 伺服器控制項概觀
